TECHNICAL SKILLS

General

Design drafting and plan visualization, descriptive technical writing, plant identification, botanical illustration

Software

General office and team use, conducting surveys, SPSS, R programming for statistical computing and data visualization and analysis, qualitative research, mixed methods, ArcGIS, project management environment, website development, Google Education environment, Blackmagic video editing, Adobe Creative Suite and other illustration and drawing software for design and architecture, photogrammetry, LIDAR, AutoCAD, Rhino.

Hardware

Desktop computer assembly and troubleshooting, soldering and electronic parts replacement, and some electrical circuit troubleshooting and repair.
